name: RGBasteroids Version 1
description:
RGBasteroids is a passion project top-down arcade shooter that adds dimension to the classic Asteroids game format.

Jump between three independent color channels! You can only interact with one color at a time, and the longer you stay on a layer, the more of that color is added to the background. The game ends when you run out of lives, or when any color reaches 100 percent!

Thrust with W
Steer with A and D
Shoot with Space
Switch colors with Shift

Engineering and sound by Alex Hanlin
Art by Jasmine Hanlin
